attributes.action: Britain's Electoral laws need to be overhauled to address 21stC issues.
attributes.additional_details:
from the New Statesman : " political advertising is exempt from the regulation that would otherwise bar false claims and outrageous promises."  lie.https://www.newstatesman.com/politics/uk/2016/06/how-brexit-campaign-lied-us-and-got-away-it

From a Guardian report 
"An LSE report concluded UK’s electoral laws were “weak and helpless” in the face of new forms of digital campaigning.”.

https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2017/may/07/the-great-british-brexit-robbery-hijacked-democracy
attributes.background: This petition requests that Parliament commissions a study into the threats posed by misinformation about the issues to be balloted and the activities of agencies employed by or donating their services to any campaign group and then responds to those threats by enacting appropriate legislation.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
